thread.title: Week ahead: Fed to hike as BoE sits tight?

title: Week ahead: Fed to hike as BoE sits tight?
text:
Week ahead: Fed to hike as BoE sits tight? 4:57pm EDT - 01:42 
Two major central banks meet this week with economists expecting the Bank of England to focus on inflation, and the U.S. Federal Reserve to respond to strong economic data with a rate rise. Ciara Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Two major central banks meet this week with economists expecting the Bank of England to focus on inflation, and the U.S. Federal Reserve to respond to strong economic data with a rate rise. Ciara Lee reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2Izcni5
